Class ScreenToWorldPointConverter

java.lang.Object
  ScreenToWorldPointConverter

public class ScreenToWorldPointConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class converts from World coordinates to screen coordinates. In Computer Graphics, this done by an affine transformation that translate from one coordinate system to another system.

Author:
manuel

ScreenToWorldPointConverter(double wXMin, double wYMin, double wXMax, double wYMax, double sXMin, double sYMin, double sXMax, double sYMax)
          Constructor based on the rectangles convering the world coordinates and the screen coordinates.
